resources.string: The Pug is a breed of dog with a wrinkly face and curly tail. Pugs are known for their playful and friendly personality. They are often referred to as clowns due to their comical behavior

Pugs are charming, mischievous, and loving dogs. They have a distinctive wrinkled face and a curled tail. Pugs are known for their sociable and affectionate nature. They are excellent companions for families and individuals alike.
